Actions.Name: Counter Strike
Actions.Description: The [name] takes a defensive pose, gaining two uses of the following interrupt, which do not refresh at the start of its turn, and last until the end of the current round. It cannot use this ability again while it has uses of this interrupt remaining.

Interrupts.Name: Counter-strike
Interrupts.Trigger: The [name] or an adjacent ally is targeted by an attack.
Interrupts.Effects: The [name] grants sturdy to the attack target for the duration of the attack. Then, after it resolves, the [name] may rush 3. If that puts it adjacent to the attacker, the attacker takes 3 damage and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Bloody Fuller
Effects: Deals damage again to attack target and all foes adjacent to the attack target, hit or miss, equal to 2 times the round number.
